description: Configuration for the Comprehensive Diabetes Model

pages.title: Advanced Setup: Population Generation - Type 1 Diabetes
Advanced Setup: Economic Factors - Type 1 Diabetes

built_in_page.title: Scenario Summary
built_in_page.message: Data as it will be sent to the simulator.

equation_set.title: Name of the complication equation set to invoke.

intervention_sets.title: Number of intervention sets to configure/run (standard simulation).

iterations.title: Number of iterations for sensitivity analysis.

size.title: Size
size.description: Number of individuals in the population.

strategy.title: Time horizon execution strategy. 'fixed' runs for a set duration. 'max_age' runs until the youngest indidual reaches the max age. 'all_deceased' runs until all  agents have passed away.

limit.title: Time step limit. Refers to the maximum number of steps or maximum age, depending on context. Only applied in 'fixed' and 'max_age' strategies

first_chf.title: Decrease risk of first congestive heart failure

first_ihd.title: Decrease risk of first ischemic heart disease event.

first_mi.title: Decrease risk of first myocardial infacrtion.

second_mi.title: Decrease risk of second myocardial infacrtion.

pvd.title: Change population peripheral vascular disease characteristics.

sbp.title: Change population systolic blood pressure characteristics.

wbc.title: Change population white blood cell characteristics.

dpn.description: Decrease risk of dermatosis papulosa nigra.

esrd.description: Decrease risk of end-stage renal disease.

npdr.description: Decrease risk of nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy.

pdr.description: Decrease risk of proliferative diabetic retinopathy.

csme.description: Decrease risk of clinically significant macular edema.

dbp.title: Change population diastolic blood pressure characteristics.

sbp.title: Change population systolic blood pressure characteristics.

risk_reductions.title: Array of risk reductions variables to sample randomly.

factor_changes.title: Array of risk factor variables to sample randomly.

risk_reductions.title: Array of risk reductions variables to sample randomly.

factor_changes.title: Array of risk factor variables to sample randomly.

string.description: String with a minimum length of 1 (i.e. excludes '')

positiveInteger.description: Integer greater than or equal to zero

interventionSetsLength.description: Integer greater than zero and less than the maximum allowable number of intervention sets
